name: Lamball
partner_skill: Fluffy Shield - Turns into a shield that attaches to the player. Can be placed on a ranch to produce wool.
description: It rolls down hills by itself. Once dizzy, it becomes easy prey at the bottom of the food chain.

name: Elecpanda
partner_skill: Yellow Juggernaut - Allows the player to ride. Can use a minigun while mounted.
description: It has a friendly face and a sturdy body, but it goes berserk when given a minigun.

name: Pengullet
partner_skill: Pengki Launcher - Attaches a rocket launcher that fires Pengki as a projectile. Explodes on impact, leaving Pengki incapacitated.
description: Its wings have completely degenerated, making it unable to fly. However, its DNA still holds a longing for the sky, and it constantly tries to take flight.

name: Kurulis
partner_skill: Kurulis Recoil - Perches on the player's head and provides suppressive fire with a submachine gun in response to attacks.
description: Has an intelligence equivalent to a 5-7 year old child. Some individuals have learned how to use firearms and are recorded to have killed their owners.

name: Paiho
partner_skill: Hug Fire - Turns into a flamethrower that attaches to the player.
description: When first born, it struggles to control its fire and frequently emits flames, sometimes choking itself. Its sneezes can cause forest fires.
